EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Registering: FSI Executive Luncheon Series - Melbourne
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for registering for our Pivotal Financial Services and Insurance Executive Luncheon.
Please find attached the details below for the event
Melbourne:
Date: Tuesday 25th November 2014
Time: 12.15 for registration with 12.30pm start â€“ 2.30pm
Location: Rockpool Private Terrace
Address: Rockpool Bar and Grill, Crown Complex, Southbank <https://www.google.com.au/maps/place/Crown+Casino+and+Entertainment+Complex/@-37.823972,144.957405,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x6ad65d52d5a34589:0xedd795a14e4e9758>

The Pivotal Team
